mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_character_map ( user_id, character_id, regist_ymdt, modify_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{characterId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_character_skill_map ( character_id, skill_id, modify_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{characterId}, #{skillId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, c.character_id AS characterId, c.character_name AS characterName, c.story AS story, c.image_url AS imageUrl, c.tier AS tier, FROM tb_user u, tb_user_character_map m, tb_character c WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.user_id = u.user_id AND c.character_id = m.character_id
SELECT skill_id AS skillId, skill_name AS skillName FROM tb_user_character_skill_map m, tb_skill s WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.character_id = #{chracterId} AND s.skill_id = m.skill_id
